thread.title: Kohinoor gets bashed online by MA Nishad
thread.title_full: Kohinoor gets bashed online by MA Nishad - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Kohinoor gets bashed online by MA Nishad
text:
The Pakal director was seen posting on a social networking platform saying," Aana mukkunadh kand annan mukkiyal Kohinoor aagum."
The actor's post implies that the film is based on the gimmicks of the old film world charm.
The director had teamed up with Asif Ali in the film, Best of Luck, which had Rima Kallingal and Archana Kavi, among others, and in which Mammootty had a cameo appearance.
